name: Dig It (GGJ 2021)
description:
Find the treasure in as few clicks as possible.

Made in 48 hours by two programmers: Glenn Comis & Mike Hergaarden.

We wanted to challenge ourself to create a polished and completed vertical slice of a game. Because of this goal we've made use of asset store packages for the art & sounds. Game design and code is completely our own.
